name: Client Sharing
tooltip: Let your clients edit their sites without paying for extra users.

name: Custom Domains
tooltip: Use your own root or subdomains (e.g. yoursite.com or www.yoursite.com).

name: Testing Domains
tooltip: Generated *.cloudvent.net domains you can use for testing.

name: Hosting
tooltip: Host your sites on supercharged CloudCannon infrastructure.

name: Storage Providers
tooltip: Synchronise your site files with GitHub, Bitbucket or Dropbox.

name: Jekyll Plugins
tooltip: Run custom Ruby code on your sites.

name: White Label
tooltip: Remove all CloudCannon branding and add your own logo when sharing to clients.

name: Increased Build Time Limit
tooltip: Remove the Jekyll build time limit. This limit is only hit on very large sites.

name: Internationalisation
tooltip: Serve your sites in multiple languages.

name: Geolocation
tooltip: Display different content to viewers based on where they are in the world.
Restrict who can view your sites.

name: Custom Routes
tooltip: Configure which parts of your sites are authenticated.
